i:view.i:description: This widget lets you edit basic user configurations. You can change your password, contact details, timezone and description. You can also select the notification media and the notification level. The widget help can also be enabled or disabled from this page. If the widget help is enabled then a help text will appear on every widget that you browse explaining the purpose of that widget.
